snippet: The International Criminal Court’s prosecutor will pursue war crimes charges related to the 2008 war Georgia and Russia fought over control of the separatist province of South Ossetia.
abstract: International Criminal Court prosecutor Fatou Bensouda plans to pursue war crimes charges stemming from 2008 war between Russia and Georgia; case will consider actions taken by South Ossetians and Georgians on Georgian soil, where court has jurisdiction.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court’s prosecutor will pursue war crimes charges related to the 2008 war Georgia and Russia fought over control of the separatist province of South Ossetia.

headline.print_headline: Hague Court May Prosecute in Ossetia War
headline.main: Hague Court May Prosecute in South Ossetia War
